text: all along the banks of the send
stretching away from this Cathedral
people are lining the pavements here in
Paris staring up at the sky at the
plumes of smoke billowing out of not too
dark Cathedral visible across Paris the
acrid smell of the Cathedral burning has
only been going about an hour or so but
already the flames seem to have
completely engulfed the roof wrapping
themselves around the turrets at the
back here we're not quite sure yet what
caused this fire this some suggestion it
could be linked to extensive renovation
works they were being carried out here
and we're told the president macron is
now on his way here firefighters this
Cathedral has been damaged so many times
in its history has been here almost a
thousand years but never anything like
this
Luci Williamson ABC News Paris
